parameters.name: blocking
parameters.docstring: If True, wait for all tasks to complete (Only valid for 'local' backend in current design).

parameters.name: model_path
parameters.docstring: Path to the frozen DeepMD model file.

parameters.name: batch_size
parameters.docstring: Batch size for inference (default: 1000). Ignored in 'cli' mode.

parameters.name: env_setup
parameters.docstring: Environment setup script for job execution.

parameters.name: blocking
parameters.docstring: Whether to wait for the job to complete (local mode only).

parameters.name: result_dir
parameters.docstring: Directory containing the test results (e.g. *.e.out files).

parameters.name: head
parameters.docstring: The head name used in dp test output files (e.g. "results").

parameters.name: type_map
parameters.docstring: List of atom types. If None, defaults to ["H", "C", "O", "Fe"].

parameters.name: fmt
parameters.docstring: Format of the data. If "auto" (default), attempts to detect "deepmd/npy/mixed" or "deepmd/npy".

parameters.name: target_systems
parameters.docstring: List of specific system names to load. If None, tries to load all subdirectories or the dir itself.

parameters.name: config_path
parameters.docstring: Path to the configuration file. Used for optimized Slurm self-submission.

parameters.name: name
parameters.docstring: Name of the parameter for logging.

parameters.name: desc_filename
parameters.docstring: Name of the descriptor file (default: "desc.npy") used in nested structure.

parameters.name: target_names
parameters.docstring: List of system names (without index) to load specifically. If provided, loads only these systems in this order.

parameters.name: expected_frames
parameters.docstring: Optional dict {sys_name: n_frames} to enforce consistency.

parameters.name: atom_counts_list
parameters.docstring: List of atom counts dict for each frame (e.g. [{"H": 2, "O": 1}, ...]). Required for cohesive energy calculation via Least Squares.

parameters.name: atom_num_list
parameters.docstring: List of total atom numbers for each frame.

parameters.name: ref_energies
parameters.docstring: Dictionary of atomic reference energies (e.g. {"H": -13.6}). If provided, overrides Least Squares fitting.

parameters.name: k
parameters.docstring: Select k structures from each cluster.

parameters.name: allow_duplicate
parameters.docstring: Whether structures are allowed to be selected over once.

parameters.name: selection_criteria
parameters.docstring: The criteria to do stratified sampling from each cluster. Supported criterion include "random", "smallest", and "center" (default). By default, structures are ranked with respect to their distances to the centroid of the cluster they locate, then up to k structures with fixed ranking intervals are selected from each cluster, and when k=1, the structure with the smallest Euclidean distance to the centroid of each cluster is sampled. For "random", k structures are randomly sampled with replacement. For "smallest", it is ensured to select the k structures with the least number of atoms in each cluster.

parameters.name: n_sites
parameters.docstring: The number of sites in all the structures to sample from. Only needed when selection_criteria="smallest".

parameters.name: clustering_data
parameters.docstring: Results from clustering in a dict. The dict should at least contain "PCAfeatures" and their respective "labels" of belonged clusters. The positions of centroid for each cluster should also be provided with "label_centers", with which data in each cluster can be ranked according to their Euclidean distance to centroid and then selected by interval for optimal coverage.

parameters.name: n
parameters.docstring: Clustering the PCs into n clusters. When n is None, the number of clusters is dependent on threshold_init and other kwargs, and the final (global) clustering step is skipped. Default to None.

parameters.name: threshold_init
parameters.docstring: The initial radius of the subcluster obtained by merging a new sample and the closest subcluster should be lesser than

parameters.name: structure_encoder
parameters.docstring: Structure featurizer. It can be any encoder that takes in a list of N structures and returns a 2-D array of N*D features, where D is the fixed dimensionality of the feature vector. By default, the M3GNet formation energy model is used. Set this to False to skip the encoding step when needed.

parameters.name: scaler
parameters.docstring: StandardScaler to perform normalization before PCA.

parameters.name: weighting_PCs
parameters.docstring: Whether to weight PC with their explained variance.

parameters.name: clustering
parameters.docstring: Clustering method to clustering based on PCs.

parameters.name: select_k_from_clusters
parameters.docstring: Straitified sampling of k structures from each cluster.

parameters.name: weighting_PCs
parameters.docstring: Whether to weight PCs with explained variances.

parameters.name: normalized_features
parameters.docstring: An array of normalized features with fixed dimensionality. The features have to be normalized first beforehand.

parameters.name: normalized_features
parameters.docstring: An array of normalized features with fixed dimensionality. The features have to be normalized first beforehand.

parameters.name: job_config
parameters.docstring: Configuration for the job. The 'command' field will be overridden to run the python script.

parameters.name: working_dir
parameters.docstring: Directory to write script and submit job.

parameters.name: trust_lo
parameters.docstring: Lower bound for QbC trust region.

parameters.name: trust_hi
parameters.docstring: Upper bound for QbC trust region.

parameters.name: rnd_trust_lo
parameters.docstring: Lower bound for RND trust region. Defaults to trust_lo.

parameters.name: rnd_trust_hi
parameters.docstring: Upper bound for RND trust region. Defaults to trust_hi.

parameters.name: rnd_col
parameters.docstring: Column name for RND UQ (usually rescaled).

parameters.name: all_features
parameters.docstring: PCA features for all samples (Joint if joint sampling used).

parameters.name: final_indices
parameters.docstring: Indices of finally selected candidates (relative to df_uq if n_candidates is None).

parameters.name: n_candidates
parameters.docstring: Number of candidate samples. If provided, assumes all_features contains [Candidates; Training]. Used to distinguish markers.

parameters.name: full_features
parameters.docstring: PCA features for the entire dataset (including filtered out ones). If provided, plotted as background.

parameters.name: ratio
parameters.docstring: The ratio of peak density to define the cutoff (default 0.5).

parameters.name: grid_size
parameters.docstring: Number of points for KDE evaluation grid.

parameters.name: bound
parameters.docstring: Tuple of (min, max) for the grid range.
